languages.text: {n}В голосе бога прорывается болезненный скрежет.{/n} "Сколь велик соблазн... Сохранить личность, но оставить в себе мощь Эсхатоса... И то, насколько я жажду поддаться этому соблазну, позволяет мне вынести Суждение: Эсхатос должен быть избыт. Владение им невозможно без развращения разума, и существование Коллектива Амарнат рано или поздно приведет к его разрушению и средоточению сокровенного секрета в руках одного. Это — неприемлемо".

{n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе бога прорывается болезненный скрежет.{/n} "Сколь велик соблазн... Сохранить личность, но оставить в себе мощь Эсхатоса... И то, насколько я жажду поддаться этому соблазну, позволяет мне вынести Суждение: Эсхатос должен быть избыт. Владение им невозможно без развращения разума, и существование Коллектива Амарнат рано или поздно приведет к его разрушению и средоточению сокровенного секрета в руках одного. Это — неприемлемо".

traits.locale_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice.{/n} "The strength of the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... Combined with my own eagerness to yield to that temptation, this allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be foregone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神の声には痛みに耐えるような響きがある。{/n}「実に大きな誘惑だ…私個人を保存するが、エスカトの力は保つ…私自身、その誘惑にあらがいがたい欲求を感じており、審判を通過させる。エスカトは諦めなくてはならない。所有者の心が邪悪に染まってしまうの。そして、アマルナト集合体の存在は、遅かれ早かれその破壊へとつながり、その最奥の秘密が1人の手へと集中することになる。これを認めることはできない」
languages.original_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}神の声には痛みに耐えるような響きがある。{/n}「実に大きな誘惑だ…私個人を保存するが、エスカトの力は保つ…私自身、その誘惑にあらがいがたい欲求を感じており、審判を通過させる。エスカトは諦めなくてはならない。所有者の心が邪悪に染まってしまうの。そして、アマルナト集合体の存在は、遅かれ早かれその破壊へとつながり、その最奥の秘密が1人の手へと集中することになる。これを認めることはできない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}神明的声音中隐约带着刺痛之意。{/n}“这样的诱惑太大了……既要保持我的人格，又要掌握终焉审判的力量……我本人的渴望正驱使着我接受这样的判断，投身于这种诱惑。不行，必须放弃终焉审判。这样的力量不配由个人掌握，不然那个人的思想必将堕落。阿玛纳特聚合意识的存在，必定会导致聚合意识轰然崩塌，聚合意识最深处的所有秘密将会全部落入某个个体的手中，这样的结果是无法接受的。”
languages.original_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}神明的声音中隐约带着刺痛之意。{/n}“这样的诱惑太大了……既要保持我的人格，又要掌握终焉审判的力量……我本人的渴望正驱使着我接受这样的判断，投身于这种诱惑。不行，必须放弃终焉审判。这样的力量不配由个人掌握，不然那个人的思想必将堕落。阿玛纳特聚合意识的存在，必定会导致聚合意识轰然崩塌，聚合意识最深处的所有秘密将会全部落入某个个体的手中，这样的结果是无法接受的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une certaine douleur transparaît dans les intonations grinçantes du dieu.{/n} « Si grande est la tentation... de préserver mon identité tout en maniant le pouvoir d'Eschatos... Mais c'est mon propre désir de céder à cette tentation qui me permet de prononcer mon jugement. Il faut renoncer à Eschatos. Quiconque essaierait de le posséder verrait son esprit corrompu, et l'existence même du collectif Amarnat amènerait sa destruction, mettant ainsi son plus grand secret entre les mains d'une seule et même entité, ce qui est totalement inacceptable. »
languages.original_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une certaine douleur transparaît dans les intonations grinçantes du dieu.{/n} « Si grande est la tentation... de préserver mon identité tout en maniant le pouvoir d'Eschatos... Mais c'est mon propre désir de céder à cette tentation qui me permet de prononcer mon jugement. Il faut renoncer à Eschatos. Quiconque essaierait de le posséder verrait son esprit corrompu, et l'existence même du collectif Amarnat amènerait sa destruction, mettant ainsi son plus grand secret entre les mains d'une seule et même entité, ce qui est totalement inacceptable. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz del dios adquiere matices de dolor.{/n} «La tentación es fuerte... Preservar mi persona y hacer uso del poder de Eschatos... Mi propio deseo de ceder a esa tentación es lo que me lleva a emitir el Juicio. Eschatos debe desaparecer. No se puede poseer sin que la mente se pervierta, y la existencia del Colectivo Amarnat conllevará su eventual destrucción, así como la concentación de sus secretos más profundos en un solo par de manos. Es inaceptable».
languages.original_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del dios adquiere matices de dolor.{/n} «La tentación es fuerte... Preservar mi persona y hacer uso del poder de Eschatos... Mi propio deseo de ceder a esa tentación es lo que me lleva a emitir el Juicio. Eschatos debe desaparecer. No se puede poseer sin que la mente se pervierta, y la existencia del Colectivo Amarnat conllevará su eventual destrucción, así como la concentación de sus secretos más profundos en un solo par de manos. Es inaceptable».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}In der Stimme des Gottes liegt ein Hauch von Schmerz.{/n} "So groß ist die Versuchung ... Meine Persönlichkeit zu bewahren und doch die Macht von Eschatos beizubehalten ... Mein eigener Durst, dieser Versuchung nachzugeben, gestattet mir, das Urteil zu sprechen. Eschatos muss vergehen. Man kann ihn nicht besitzen, ohne dass der eigene Verstand verdorben wird, und die Existenz des Amarnat-Kollektivs wird früher oder später zu seiner Zerstörung und zur Konzentration des innersten Geheimnis in der Hand eines Einzelnen führen. Das ist inakzeptabel."
languages.original_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Stimme des Gottes liegen knirschende Beiklänge von Schmerz.{/n} "So groß ist die Versuchung ... Meine Persönlichkeit zu bewahren und doch die Macht von Eschatos beizubehalten ... Mein eigener Durst, dieser Versuchung nachzugeben, gestattet mir, das Urteil zu sprechen. Eschatos muss vergehen. Man kann ihn nicht besitzen, ohne dass der eigene Verstand verdorben wird."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tanrının sesinde kulak tırmalayıcı derecede acılı bir ton hissediliyor.{/n} "Hem kişiliğimi korumak hem de Eskatos'un gücünü de elimde bulundurmak. Çok cazip. Bu cazibeye boyun eğme isteğimle Hüküm verme kabiliyetimi kazanıyorum. Eskatos geçmişte kalmalı. Kimse zihni bozulmadan onu elinde bulunduramaz. Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün varlığı, er ya da geç yok oluşuna ve büyük sırrın birilerinin eline geçmesine yol açacak. Bu kabul edilemez."
languages.original_text: {n}There are grating overtones of pain in the god's voice:{/n} "So great is the temptation... To preserve my personhood and yet hold on to the power of Eschatos... My own thirst to yield to that temptation is what allows me to pass the Judgement. Eschatos must be forgone. One cannot possess it without one's mind becoming depraved, and the existence of the Amarnat Collective will sooner or later lead to its destruction and the concentration of the innermost secret in the hands of one. This is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tanrının sesinde kulak tırmalayıcı derecede acılı bir ton var:{/n} "Cezbediciliği çok büyük. Kişiliğimi korumak ancak Eschatos'un gücünü de elimde bulundurmak. Bu cezbediciliğe boyun eğme isteğim, bana Hüküm verme kabiliyetini veren şey. Eschatos geçmişte kalmalı. Kimse onu zihni bozulmadan elinde bulunduramaz ve Amarnat Bütünlüğü'nün varlığı, er ya da geç yok oluşuna ve en derin sırrı bir kişinin elinde bulundurmasına yol açacak. Bu, kabul edilemez."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
